lines.text: for j = 1 to a / 2 inclusive , print *
lines.code: for ( int j = 1 ; j <= a / 2 ; j ++ ) { cout << ' * ' ; }

lines.text: for j = 1 to n - a inclusive , print D

lines.text: for j = 1 to a / 2 inclusive , print *

lines.text: for integer j is equal to a / 2 , j is greater than 0 , decrement j by 1 , print *
lines.code: for ( int j = a / 2 ; j > 0 ; j -- ) { cout << ' * ' ; }

lines.code: for ( int j = n - a ; j > 0 ; j -- ) cout << ' D ' ;
